import React from 'react' import classes from './Hotel.module.css' import image from '../../../assets/second.jpg' import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; const hotel = (args) => { return(
{args.name}
{args.rating}
< i class="fa fa-money" aria-hidden="true"> {args.price}
{args.address}
) } export default hotel;
